original_text: You were far away from God. But now, God has brought you near to himself, because you belong to Christ Jesus. That is possible because of Christ's death on the cross as a sacrifice.
korean_text: 이제는 전에 멀리 있던 너희가 그리스도 예수 안에서 그리스도의 피로 가까워졌느니라

sentences.original_text: You were far away from God.
But now, God has brought you near to himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 하나님은 너를 자기에게 가깝게 이끄셨다

sentences.original_text: because you belong to Christ Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 너는 그리스도 예수에게 속하기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: That is possible because of Christ's death
on the cross as a sacrifice.
